item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Oooooo, Nicks apple parcels look so yummy. They remind me of MacDonalds apple pie, but these probably taste a million times better!
item.content:encoded: Oooooo, Nicks apple parcels look so yummy. They remind me of MacDonalds apple pie, but these probably taste a million times better!

item.title: By: Paula
item.dc:creator: Paula
item.description: This looks SO GOOD! I love apple pastries in general, and your pie/tart/parcel seems delicious!
item.content:encoded: This looks SO GOOD! I love apple pastries in general, and your pie/tart/parcel seems delicious!

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: These look fantastic! So do you think the pastry tasted good enough to make it worth making from scratch versus buying ready made one? I always think making pastry is a hassle though the Masterchef masterclass did make it look easy!
item.content:encoded: These look fantastic! So do you think the pastry tasted good enough to make it worth making from scratch versus buying ready made one? I always think making pastry is a hassle though the Masterchef masterclass did make it look easy!

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Looks like you did a good job! There is something comforting about apple pastries :)
item.content:encoded: Looks like you did a good job! There is something comforting about apple pastries ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sophia

item.description: oh they look so AMAZING! I love that pairing of the ice cream!
item.content:encoded: oh they look so AMAZING! I love that pairing of the ice cream!

item.title: By: jasmine
item.dc:creator: jasmine
item.description:
Good for you for trying shortcrust again--it looks like a good recipe. Nicely done with the treats.
j
item.content:encoded:
Good for you for trying shortcrust again–it looks like a good recipe. Nicely done with the treats.

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: Yum! These look delicious, and I am always after a quick and easy way to make pastry that doesn't turn out like cardboard.
item.content:encoded: Yum! These look delicious, and I am always after a quick and easy way to make pastry that doesn’t turn out like cardboard.

item.title: By: zoe
item.dc:creator: zoe
item.description: These look like flaky buttery pockets of heaven. I love pink lady apples and bet they were very tasty in that pastry!
item.content:encoded: These look like flaky buttery pockets of heaven. I love pink lady apples and bet they were very tasty in that pastry!
